title: MiaoBoard插件变量
author: EmeraldEgg
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1230587488 于 2019-8-27 10:24 编辑 

请问大家，如何在MiaoBoard计分板显示Vault的金钱数和PlayerPoints的点券数?
和不同的权限组如何显示不同的计分板

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
1230587488 发表于 2019-8-27 10:25
请问哪一些Papi扩展?papi ecloud download Player吗
/papi ecloud download Vault
/papi ecloud download PlayerPoints

replies.author: EmeraldEgg
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2019-8-27 10:23
%vault_eco_balance%
